Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the accolades of 'Laal Singh Chaddha' released in 2022?
Options:
A. A. Kareena Kapoor Khan received a nomination for Best Actress at the Filmfare Awards.
B. B. 'Laal Singh Chaddha' won the Best Actress award at the Filmfare Awards.
C. C. The Filmfare Awards ceremony for this nomination took place on April 27, 2023.
D. D. Kareena Kapoor Khan was the only actress nominated for any award at the Filmfare Awards for this film.

Which of the following accolades are associated with the movie 'Laal Singh Chaddha' released in 2022?
Options:
A. Pritam received a nomination for Best Music Director at the Filmfare Awards.
B. The film was nominated for Best Picture at the Oscars.
C. Aamir Khan received a nomination for Best Actor at the Filmfare Awards.
D. The film won Best Music Director at the Filmfare Awards.
Correct Answer: Pritam received a nomination for Best Music Director at the Filmfare Awards.

A. Best Special Effects

Which of the following accolades are associated with Amitabh Bhattacharya for the movie 'Laal Singh Chaddha' (2022)?
Options:
A. Nominated for Best Lyricist at the Filmfare Awards
B. Won Best Actor at the Filmfare Awards
C. Nominated for Best Song at the Filmfare Awards
D. Nominated for Best Lyricist for 'Tere Hawaale'
Correct Answer: Nominated for Best Lyricist at the Filmfare Awards, Nominated for Best Lyricist for 'Tere Hawaale'

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the accolades received by 'Laal Singh Chaddha' (2022)?
Options:
A. Sonu Nigam received a nomination for Best Playback Singer - Male at the Filmfare Awards for the song 'Main Ki Karaan?'
B. The Filmfare Awards ceremony took place on April 27, 2023.
C. Laal Singh Chaddha won the Best Film award at the Filmfare Awards.
D. Sonu Nigam performed the song 'Main Ki Karaan?' in Laal Singh Chaddha.
Correct Answer: Sonu Nigam received a nomination for Best Playback Singer - Male at the Filmfare Awards for the song 'Main Ki Karaan?', The Filmfare Awards ceremony took place on April 27, 2023.
